en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
Mēs nevaram izveidot savienojumu.
Pārbaudi interneta savienojumu.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
Kaut kas nav tā...
radīsim jaunu kodu pēc iespējas ātrāk.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: Lūdzam piedošanu, bet esam zaudējuši savienojumu ar Jackbox Games serveriem. Mēģināsim vēl.
en.TIMEOUT:
Lūdzam piedošanu, bet nevaram izveidot savienojumu ar Jackbox Games serveriem.
Pārbaudi interneta savienojumu.
en.STEAM_ERROR: Mēs nevaram pārbaudīt tavu Steam licenci.
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_1: Esi pēdējais, kas izdzīvos sērijveida slepkavas absurdā spēlē. Bet tas ir jautri!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_2: Kāds procents cilvēku kaut ko ieraka mežā? Braucis policijas mašīnas aizmugures sēdeklī? Iemīlējušies kādā, ar ko viņi strādā? Uzmini pareizi un uzvari!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_3: Spēle ballītēm saki-jebko atgriežas. Izdomā “sliktu zobu pavedienu nomaiņu” un uzvāri! Noguruši no mūsu dīvainajiem uzvedniem? Izmēģini jauno režīmā VEIDO PATS
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_4: Katrs dod atbildi, bet ne visi zina jautājumu. Vienam no taviem draugiem ir kas slēpt. Atrodi blēdi, kamēr nav par vēlu!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_5: Zīmē bildes, raksti saukļus un pēc tam tos nomaini, lai izveidotu savus paša karavīru kreklus. Tikai viscienīgākais T-krekls pametīs turnīru dzīvu.
en.HELP_LINE_1: Izvēlies un laid vaļā spēli ar tastatūru vai spēļu kontrolieri.
en.HELP_LINE_2: Kad būs pieejams spēļu TELPAS KODS, paņem savu telefonu, planšetu vai laptopu.
en.HELP_LINE_6:
Pirmais spēlētājs, kas ienācis spēle (VIP) varēs sākt spēlēt
no savas ierīces, kad visi būs gatavi.

fr.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
fr.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, your room was destroyed.
We'll get you a new one as soon as possible.
fr.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers, we're going to retry.
fr.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
fr.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
fr.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
fr.BADGE_SUB_PLAYERS:
UTILISEZ VOS TÉLÉPHONES/TABLETTES
EN TANT QUE CONTRÔLEURS
fr.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_1: Be the last to survive a serial killer's absurd trivia game show. But it's fun!
fr.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_2: What percentage of people have buried something in the woods? Ridden in the back of a cop car? Have a crush on someone they work with? Guess right and win!
fr.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_3: The say-anything party game returns. Come up with "a bad substitute for dental floss" and win! Tired of our weird prompts? Try the new Make Your Own mode!
fr.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_4: Everyone gives an answer, but not everyone knows the question. One of your friends has something to hide. Find the faker before it’s too late!
fr.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_5: Draw pictures, write slogans, then swap them around to create your own custom t-shirt warriors. Only the most worthy novelty t-shirt will leave the tournament alive.
fr.SETTINGS_FULL_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: ON will make the game full-screen.
fr.SETTINGS_VOLUME_DESCRIPTION: Make the game LOUD or QUIET.
fr.SETTINGS_FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION:
Turn ON to avoid the most provocative content
in Guesspionage, Quiplash 2, and Trivia Murder Party.
fr.SETTINGS_AUDIENCE_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION:
Extends timers in Quiplash 2– recommended only for streamed games.
Causes answer timer in Quiplash 2 to always run to zero.
fr.SETTINGS_AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION:
Audience Mode ON means non-players can join and affect the game.
Applies to Trivia Murder Party, Guesspionage, and Quiplash 2.
fr.HELP_LINE_1:
Select which game you want to play.
Each game is started from the Game Picker screen using a controller.
fr.HELP_LINE_2:
Once you've reached the lobby screen, GET OUT YOUR PHONE OR TABLET!
All you need to play each game is a web-connected phone, tablet or laptop! No controllers needed!
fr.HELP_LINE_3:
Simply go to jackbox.tv on your mobile device.
Each game is accessed through a website, but is played via the system.
fr.HELP_LINE_4:
Enter the 4-letter room code shown on the TV screen.
Every new game started has a unique room code.
fr.HELP_LINE_5:
Enter your player name.
Player on mobile devices means easy access to keyboards!
fr.HELP_LINE_6:
Once all players are ready, hit the “EVERYBODY'S IN” button to play!
Wheeee!
